text.p: American Medcare Corp said Wednesday it has completed its merger with InfoCure Corp.
Under the terms of the merger agreement, InfoCure will exchange about 3.4 million shares of its common stock for all the issued and outstanding stock of American Medcare.
Each share of American Medcare is exchangeable for 0.05966 of a share of InfoCure, the equivalent of about 16.76 shares of American Medcare for one share of InfoCure.
InfoCure is a newly formed Delaware corporation established by executives of American Medcare for the purpose of integrating certain practice management business systems with American Medcare.
InfoCure develops, markets and supports practice management software products and related services for healthcare practices.
